txt.en:
'The text you recovered told of an alliance between Angmar and the goblins of Goblin-town.  Rumour has been told that Angmar and Goblin-town have had troubles entreating in the past. It is strange to find the goblins here. Perhaps this emissary is here without the knowledge of his leaders.

'You should investigate the matter. There have been many reports of goblins near the tower of Minas Maur near Barad Gúlaran. We must stop this alliance from happening, no matter the cost.

'Defeat the emissary and return to me when the deed is done. If you wish to succeed, you will likely want to take allies with you.'
'You have helped the Free Peoples avoid the greatest of threats! An alliance between the goblins of the Misty Mountains and the Iron Crown would have been disastrous!'
'You must defeat the goblin Prakhum and stop the alliance between the Iron Crown and the goblins of the Misty Mountains.'

txt.es: Emisario de la Ciudad de los Duendes

txt.en: Goblin-town has sent an emissary to Minas Maur to treat with Angmar.
Enter Minas Maur and defeat the emissary of Goblin-town

Minas Maur is one of the large towers of Barad Gúlaran, south of Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou must travel to Barad Gúlaran and defeat the emissary from Goblin-town inside Minas Maur. Brúfair suggested you take allies with you.
Gath Forthnír is north of Barad Gúluran.\n\nHaving defeated Prakhum, return to Gath Forthnír and let Brúnfair know what you have done.
